feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -19.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 12:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -19.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -25.2°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets at times mixed with snow changing to freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets near noon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
